item.description:
What's New

feat: Centralize version management with xcconfig

  • Add Version.xcconfig to manage MARKETINGVERSION and CURRENTPROJECT_VERSION in one place
  • Update Info.plist files to use $(MARKETINGVERSION) and $(CURRENTPROJECT_VERSION) variables
  • Add debug logging for cursor tracking and desync detection in XKeyIMController
  • Improve startup logging with version info in XKeyIM
